name: width

value.name: value
value.description: The border width value you want to apply like 10, 20, etc...

description:
This mixin allows you to apply a border width with a value coming
from the config.theme.border.width stack like 10, 20, etc...

package.name: @coffeekraken/s-postcss-sugar-plugin
package.description: Postcss Coffeekraken plugin that gives you access to a ton of sugar like "@sugar.when.dark", "@sugar.classes", etc... mixins as well as functions like "sugar.padding", "sugar.color", etc... All of these makes uses of your theme configuration defined using the @coffeekraken/s-sugar-config system.
package.author: Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

docblocks.name: width
docblocks.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a border width with a value coming
from the config.theme.border.width stack like 10, 20, etc...

value.name: value
value.description: The border width value you want to apply like 10, 20, etc...

docblocks.raw:
/**
*
* @name          width
* @as              @s.border.width
* @namespace     node.mixin.border
* @type          PostcssMixin
* @platform      postcss
* @status        stable
*
* This mixin allows you to apply a border width with a value coming
* from the config.theme.border.width stack like 10, 20, etc...
*
* @param       {Number}      value     The border width value you want to apply like 10, 20, etc...
* @return      {Css}                   The generated css
*
* @todo      Add multiple values support like @s.border.width(10);
*
* @snippet         @s.border.width($1)
*
* @example       css
* .my-element {
*    @s.border.width(10);
* }
*
* @since     2.0.0
* @author 	                Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

*/
